TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EmbeddedMailObject extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示要在使用 类构造的电子邮件中嵌入的项。

span.span: Represents an item to embed in an email message constructed using the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 表示要在 mail 邮件中嵌入的项。The represents an item to embed in a mail message. 这些嵌入的项可以是图像文件，如公司徽标。These embedded items can be image files such as company logos. 每个嵌入的项指定一个标识符和路径。Each embedded item is specified by an identifier and a path. 若要确保电子邮件消息文件中正确显示嵌入的对象，必须满足以下条件：To ensure that an embedded object is displayed correctly within the email message file, the following conditions must be met: - 邮件消息的 HTML 格式。The mail message is in HTML format. - 图像文件 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等） 的产品。The item is an image file (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on). - 中指定的 HTML 格式的正文文件属性包含对使用以下语法的图像文件的引用：The HTML-formatted body file specified in the property contains a reference to the image file using the following syntax: ``` . ``` 如果添加到一封电子邮件，并且不满足所有的先前指定的要求，它将最有可能显示为 mail 邮件的附件。If an is added to a mail message and does not fulfill all of the requirements specified previously, it will most likely be displayed as an attachment in the mail message. 如果项是引用的邮件消息中的标识符，但不是包含作为嵌入项目，它将显示为已损坏的附件中，查看邮件时。If an item is referenced by an identifier in the mail message but not included as an embedded item, it will appear as a broken attachment when the mail is viewed. 存储的集合单个邮件消息的对象。The stores a collection of objects for a single mail message. 由属性的对象创建电子邮件。The is used by the property of the object to create the mail message. 通过设置可在以下 Web 控件中配置的允许嵌入的对象的邮件消息是其属性以声明方式：Mail messages that allow embedded objects are configurable in the following Web controls by setting their properties declaratively: - - - > [!NOTE] > 中的值和对象不存储在视图状态中。The values in the and objects are not stored in view state. 这样可以防止恶意用户发现您的服务器的路径信息。This protects against malicious users discovering path information for your server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个使用 ASP.NET 网页Web 控件，并包含的事件处理程序名为事件`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：实现简单的窗体身份验证](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密码更改成功中的代码`SendingMail`事件处理程序尝试将电子邮件发送给用户以确认更改。If the password change succeeds, the code in the `SendingMail` event handler attempts to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 若要运行此代码示例的顺序中的服务器上必须已配置 SMTP。SMTP must already be configured on the server in order for this code example to work. 有关如何配置 SMTP 服务器的信息，请参阅[NIB:如何：安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 对于此示例的目的，它不需要配置 SMTP 服务器;该示例构造要用于发送电子邮件消息失败的测试。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生某些其他错误，无法发送电子邮件，`SendMailError`调用函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 向用户显示一条消息。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假设事件源的命名 MySamplesSite 已存在 Windows 应用程序事件日志记录一个事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 请参阅下面创建指定的事件源的代码示例。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 有关创建事件源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的属性对象设置为`true`以指示已处理该错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果需要以编程方式添加名 MySamplesSite 为你的应用程序日志的事件源，请使用下面的代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件源必须存在于第一个代码示例中正常工作的顺序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例可以用作前面的示例代码的 ChangePasswordMail.htm 文件。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the preceding example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 发送用户帐户名或电子邮件中的密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件消息通常以纯文本发送，并且可以通过"探查"应用程序的特殊网络读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用中所述的缓解[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

Your password for the account named "<%Username%>" has changed.

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取或设置嵌入项的标识符，使用属性。To get or set the identifier of the embedded item, use the property. 若要获取或设置嵌入项的路径，请使用属性。To get or set the path to the embedded item, use the property. 这两个属性必须设置为已成功在 mail 邮件中嵌入项。Both properties must be set to successfully embed the item in the mail message.

param.name: name

span.span: The name used as the identifier of the item to embed in the mail message.

param.name: path
param.span: 要嵌入邮件的项的检索路径。

span.span: The path used to retrieve an item to embed in the mail message.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified identifier name and path to populate the object.

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了使用 ASP.NET 页面的代码隐藏示例控件，并包括的事件处理程序名为事件`SendingMail`。The following code example shows a code-behind example of an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 此代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。This code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：实现简单的窗体身份验证](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密码更改成功中的代码`SendingMail`事件处理程序尝试将电子邮件发送给用户以确认更改。If the password change succeeds, the code in the `SendingMail` event handler attempts to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 若要运行此代码示例的顺序中的服务器上必须已配置 SMTP。SMTP must already be configured on the server in order for this code example to work. 有关如何配置 SMTP 服务器的信息，请参阅[NIB:如何：安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 对于此示例的目的，它不需要配置 SMTP 服务器;该示例构造要用于发送电子邮件消息失败的测试。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生某些其他错误，无法发送电子邮件，`SendMailError`调用函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 向用户显示一条消息。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假设事件源的命名 MySamplesSite 已存在 Windows 应用程序事件日志记录一个事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 请参阅下面创建指定的事件源的代码示例。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 有关创建事件源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的属性对象设置为`true`以指示已处理该错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用一个.aspx 页面。The following code example demonstrates using an .aspx page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用代码隐藏文件。The following code example demonstrates using a code-behind file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword/CS/changepassword.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword/VB/changepassword.vb#2)] 如果需要以编程方式添加名 MySamplesSite 为你的应用程序日志的事件源，请使用下面的代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件源必须存在于第一个代码示例中正常工作的顺序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例可以用作前面的示例代码的 ChangePasswordMail.htm 文件。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the preceding example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 发送用户帐户名或电子邮件中的密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in an email message is a potential security threat. 电子邮件消息通常以纯文本发送，并且可以通过"探查"应用程序的特殊网络读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用中所述的缓解[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

summary.span: 获取或设置作为邮件中嵌入项的标识符使用的名称，该邮件是使用 类构造的。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that is used as the identifier of the item to be embedded in a mail message constructed with the class.

value.span: 返回邮件中嵌入项的标识符。

span.span: Returns the identifier of the item to embed in a mail message.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性指定要在用来以声明方式构造的一封电子邮件中嵌入的项的标识符类。The property specifies an identifier for an item to embed in a mail message constructed declaratively with the class. 标识符用于将映射中包含的项属性中指定的文件的正文中的相应位置属性，使用以下语法：The identifier is used to map the item contained in the property to its appropriate location in the body of the file specified in the property, using the following syntax: ``` ``` 通常情况下，项是一个图像文件。Typically, the item is an image file. 默认值为属性为空字符串。The default for the property is an empty string. 它是在邮件中为任何嵌入的图像中设置备用文本属性的可访问性设计的最佳做法。It is a best practice for accessibility design to set the alternate text property in your mail message for any embedded images. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个使用 ASP.NET 网页Web 控件，并包含的事件处理程序名为事件`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：实现简单的窗体身份验证](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密码更改成功中的代码`SendingMail`事件处理程序尝试将电子邮件发送给用户以确认更改。If the password change succeeds, the code in the `SendingMail` event handler attempts to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 若要运行此代码示例的顺序中的服务器上必须已配置 SMTP。SMTP must already be configured on the server in order for this code example to work. 有关如何配置 SMTP 服务器的信息，请参阅[NIB:如何：安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 对于此示例的目的，它不需要配置 SMTP 服务器;该示例构造要用于发送电子邮件消息失败的测试。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生某些其他错误，无法发送电子邮件，`SendMailError`调用函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 向用户显示一条消息。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假设事件源的命名 MySamplesSite 已存在 Windows 应用程序事件日志记录一个事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 请参阅下面创建指定的事件源的代码示例。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 有关创建事件源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的属性对象设置为`true`以指示已处理该错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果需要以编程方式添加名 MySamplesSite 为你的应用程序日志的事件源，请使用下面的代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件源必须存在于第一个代码示例中正常工作的顺序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例可以用作前面的示例代码的 ChangePasswordMail.htm 文件。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the preceding example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 发送用户帐户名或电子邮件中的密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in an email message is a potential security threat. 电子邮件以纯文本形式发送，并且可以通过"探查"应用程序的特殊网络读取。Email messages are sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用中所述的缓解[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```

member this.Path : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置用于检索邮件中嵌入项的路径，该邮件是使用 类构造的。

span.span: Gets or sets the path that is used to retrieve an item to embed in a mail message constructed with the class.

value.span: 返回要嵌入邮件的项的路径。

span.span: Returns the path to the item to embed in a mail message.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性指定您想要以声明方式构造与 mail 邮件中嵌入的项的路径对象。The property specifies the path to the item you want to embed in the mail message constructed declaratively with the object. 中的文件路径必须如 C:\MyServer\Banner.gif 的路径。The file path in must be a path such as C:\MyServer\Banner.gif. 通常情况下，嵌入的项是一个图像文件。Typically, the embedded item is an image file. 如果图像文件是按其在 mail 邮件中的标识符引用，但不是包括在消息中，该图像显示为已损坏的附件时查看电子邮件。If an image file is referenced by its identifier in the mail message but not included in the message, the image appears as a broken attachment when the email message is viewed. 它是在邮件中为任何嵌入的图像中设置备用文本属性的可访问性设计的最佳做法。It is a best practice for accessibility design to set the alternate text property in your mail message for any embedded images. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个使用 ASP.NET 网页Web 控件，并包含的事件处理程序名为事件`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：实现简单的窗体身份验证](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密码更改成功中的代码`SendingMail`事件处理程序尝试将电子邮件发送给用户以确认更改。If the password change succeeds, the code in the `SendingMail` event handler attempts to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 若要运行此代码示例的顺序中的服务器上必须已配置 SMTP。SMTP must already be configured on the server in order for this code example to work. 有关如何配置 SMTP 服务器的信息，请参阅[NIB:如何：安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 对于此示例的目的，它不需要配置 SMTP 服务器;该示例构造要用于发送电子邮件消息失败的测试。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生某些其他错误，无法发送电子邮件，`SendMailError`调用函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 向用户显示一条消息。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假设事件源的命名 MySamplesSite 已存在 Windows 应用程序事件日志记录一个事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 请参阅下面创建指定的事件源的代码示例。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 有关创建事件源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的属性对象设置为`true`以指示已处理该错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果需要以编程方式添加名 MySamplesSite 为你的应用程序日志的事件源，请使用下面的代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件源必须存在于第一个代码示例中正常工作的顺序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例可以用作前面的示例代码的 ChangePasswordMail.htm 文件。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the preceding example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 发送用户帐户名或电子邮件中的密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in an email message is a potential security threat. 电子邮件消息通常以纯文本发送，并且可以通过"探查"应用程序的特殊网络读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用中所述的缓解[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

Your password for the account named "<%Username%>" has changed.

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```
